field.name: el_enable
field.label: Enable Unlimited Elements
field.description: If disabled, the Unlimited Elements will not appear in the Elementor Page Builder

field.name: consolidate_addons
field.label: Consolidate Widgets
field.description: Consolidate widgets, category into one addon. If consolidated, the initial design may not look as in demo, but it save memory

field.name: js_in_footer
field.label: Js Always in Footer
field.description: Put addon javascript always in the footer of the page. If no, it will be put right after the body

field.name: js_saparate
field.label: Each JS in saparate tag
field.description: if yes, each js will be put in saparate tag with it's own id. good for optimization plugins

field.name: css_includes_to
field.label: Include Css Files To
field.description: Choose where to include css files

field.name: output_wrapping_comments
field.label: Output Wrapping HTML Comments
field.description: Output comments before and after widgets in source html output

field.name: enable_import_export
field.label: Show Import and Export Buttons In Templates
field.description: Show special import and export buttons (import and export with images) in elementor saved templates screen

field.name: enable_backgrounds
field.label: Enable Background Widgets
field.description: Enable background widgets for elementor sections

field.name: enable_panel_previews
field.label: Show Elementor Panel Widgets Previews
field.description: Show preview images of widget boxes in elementor editor side panel

field.name: show_edit_html_button
field.label: Show "Edit HTML" Button in Widget Settings
field.description: Show "Edit HTML" button in elementor panel widget settings

field.name: force_disable_font_awesome
field.label: Force Disable Font Awesome
field.description: Disable font awesome from loading from the plugin in all widgets. Sometimes good for optimization.

field.name: alphabetic_attributes
field.label: Sort Attributes in Widgets Editor by A-Z
field.description: Sort the order of the attributes in widgets editor alphabetically

field.name: edit_permission
field.label: Edit Permission
field.description: The addon/assets edit will be visible to the selected user categories

field.name: google_map_key
field.label: Google Map API Key
field.description: Used to output a map in google maps related widget. Read this article for instructions:

field.name: wpml_button
field.label: Check widgets fields that are ready for wpml automatic translation.

field.name: memory_limit_text_desc
field.label: In case of insufficient memory, you can increase WordPress memory limit wp config file (wp-config.php)

field.name: enable_memory_usage_test
field.label: Enable Memory Usage Test
field.description:
Use it when you have some memory crash.
When enabling it it will log every addon and field register operation
and sugniffically slow down the editor work. Use it only for testing and turn it off after.

field.name: memory_usage_button
field.label:
Show last memory usage log
Run it after the editor run with the memory test

field.name: disable_post_content_filters
field.label: Disable post content output filters
field.description: Sometimes post content filters causing memory errors. Disabling them can make the page load in case stucked pages

field.name: show_php_error
field.label: Show PHP Error Message
field.description: Use it when you see some text about php error and want to see it.

field.name: text_overload_button
field.label:
Test the server for overload bug,
run this test when the edit page get stuck for any reason
when the unlimited elements plugin is on.

field.name: text_connectivity_button
field.label: Test the api connectivity. Run it if you don't see any widgets inside the widgets catalog

field.name: text_phpinfo_button
field.label: Show the phpinfo - php server configuration table
